results.title: Cyclosporine therapy could be considered for membranoproliferative glomerulonephritis with immunoglobulin A deposits: a case report
results.text_hl: Based on these findings, the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was diagnosed with @GENE_CD79A @GENE_973 @@@IgA@@@-dominant @<m>DISEASE_Glomerulonephritis_Membranoproliferative</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015432 @@@MPGN@@@. Accordingly, she was treated with three courses of @CHEMICAL_Methylprednisolone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008775 @@@methylprednisolone@@@ pulse therapy (MPT), followed by @CHEMICAL_Prednisolone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011239 @@@prednisolone@@@, @CHEMICAL_mizoribine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C010052 @@@mizoribine@@@, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@.

citations.NLM: Hidaka Y, Tamura H, Furuie K, Kuraoka S, Nagata H, Nakazato H. Cyclosporine therapy could be considered for membranoproliferative glomerulonephritis with immunoglobulin A deposits: a case report BMC Nephrol. 2022 Nov 7;23(1):358. PMID: 36344919
citations.BibTeX: @article{36344919, title={Cyclosporine therapy could be considered for membranoproliferative glomerulonephritis with immunoglobulin A deposits: a case report}, author={Hidaka Y and Tamura H and Furuie K and Kuraoka S and Nagata H and Nakazato H}, journal={BMC Nephrol}, volume={23}, number={1}, pages={358}}

results.title: Rare case of spot diagnosis of nephrotic syndrome in a Saudi male.
results.text_hl: He also received @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@lipitor@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@. The occurrence of partial @DISEASE_Retinal_Dystrophies @DISEASE_MESH:D058499 @@@lipo- dystrophy@@@ and @DISEASE_Retinal_Drusen @DISEASE_MESH:D015593 @@@drusen@@@ in a @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ with @DISEASE_Nephrotic_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D009404 @@@nephrotic syndrome@@@ provides a rare clinical opportunity of making a bedside diagnosis of @<m>DISEASE_Glomerulonephritis_Membranoproliferative</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015432 @@@type II MPGN@@@ even before kidney biopsy.

citations.NLM: Askar A, Mushtaq F, Al Shuaibi F, Mustafa M, Bappu A. Rare case of spot diagnosis of nephrotic syndrome in a Saudi male. Saudi J Kidney Dis Transpl. 2011 Sep;22(5):1003-7. PMID: 21912033
citations.BibTeX: @article{21912033, title={Rare case of spot diagnosis of nephrotic syndrome in a Saudi male.}, author={Askar A and Mushtaq F and Al Shuaibi F and Mustafa M and Bappu A}, journal={Saudi J Kidney Dis Transpl}, volume={22}, number={5}, pages={1003-7}}
